name: Outbreak SR Zero
description:
Version Alpha 0.1.1 - Ongoing Development

There has been a class 5 outbreak in Sunderland, UK.

Commander it's your job to eradicate the infection, using all forces available.

Alpha Video 2

Controls Mouse RTS Style.

LMB + Drag Select

RMB Move To

--- Update Alpha 0.1.2 ---

  • Minor improvements
  • Initial work on new character models
  • Mac and Linux Builds

--- Update Alpha 0.1.1 ---

  • Added more Zombies and Citizens so expect slower frame rates.
  • Minor Improvements to levels.
  • Fixed a couple of bugs here and there.
